data.title: Debenhams revenue 2010-2018
data.meta_description: The annual revenue of Debenhams has fallen flat in the past decade, stagnating around 2.2 million British pounds in 2018 as displayed in this statistic.
data.text:
Debenhams revenue worldwide 2010-2018

Published by P. Smith,

Supplementary notes
